message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. I'm hoping for a long-term partnership!
Your offer was quite unfair. Let's split it more evenly this time. I'm hoping we can both benefit from this.
I appreciate your offer, but it's still too low.  Let's split it more evenly, at 60/40. I'm willing to compromise.
Time is running out, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. This is my final offer.
This is my last offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least 70% of the money.  This is the only way we both can come out ahead in the long run.
